data.eml:eml: Paraedessa, a new genus of Edessinae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nunes, Valéria Juliete Da Silva Benedito Mendes, Fernandes, José Antônio Marin (2013): Paraedessa, a new genus of Edessinae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae). Zootaxa 3716 (3): 395-416, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3716.3.4
